      • select

        public FTPResource select(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from class: Resource
        Select a subresource by name relative to this resource. By default, this simply appends name to the URI of this resource. Subclasses may override this to introduce special behavior.
        Specified by:
        select in class Resource<FTPSession,FTPResource>
        Parameters:
        name - the unescaped name of a subresource to select.
        Returns:
        A subresource of this resource.

      • mkdir

        public Bell<?> mkdir()
        Description copied from class: Resource
        Create this resource as a directory on the storage system. If the resource cannot be created, or already exists and is not a directory, the returned Bell will be resolved with an Exception.
        Overrides:
        mkdir in class Resource<FTPSession,FTPResource>
        Returns:
        (via bell) null if successful.

        Description copied from class: Resource
